assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Commercial Bank of Kuwait K.P.S.C. provides various banking products and services to corporate and individual customers in Kuwait, Asia, Europe, and internationally. It operates in Corporate and Retail Banking, and Treasury and Investment Banking segments. The companys deposit products include checking, YOU, current, savings, on demand, salary, and Al-Najma accounts, as well as term deposits. Its loan portfolio comprises housing, short/long term, auto, consumer, and expatriate loans; and overdrafts, import and export letters of credit, letters of guarantee, foreign exchange lines, syndicated loans, and structured and project finance, as well as short, medium, and long term loans. The company also offers card, foreign exchange and money market products, and brokerage services, as well as treasury bonds. In addition, it provides trade financing, Internet banking, POS terminal and payment gateway, safe deposit box, and credit services. The company was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Kuwait City, Kuwait.
